channel.title: FireFox Messing Up
channel.description:
Everything seems to be breaking on me this week.
When I got on this morning, I realized my enter button didn't respond on Firefox, and it does definitly work. I have to click the go button, but sometimes that doesn't work and I have to press it 2-3 times.
Sometimes Images don't show up which is very annoying on some forums.
Anyone know how to fix?
<3

item.title: FireFox Messing Up
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Is this on Windows or Linux?

Whichever it’s on, first thing to try is uninstall and reinstall. When uninstalling make sure to delete
[b]C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox[/b]

and then delete this registry entry
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Mozilla\Mozilla Firefox 2.0.0.3

Then try reinstalling and hopefully it will work.

Read full topic
